pullrequest.title: depend on ign-cmake2 and remove xenial metadata

content.raw:
prerelease debbuilds are unstable since some header files are not installed:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign-tools-debbuilder&build=38)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/38/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/38/

it's also causing find_package to fail:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=130)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/130/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/130/console

so I updated the install rules to install the include files as well in d8f823e5ebaa, which fixed the debbuild:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign-tools-debbuilder&build=40)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/40/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/40/

ign-launch build on-going:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=131)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/131/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/131/console
content.html:
prerelease debbuilds are unstable since some header files are not installed:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/38/

it's also causing find_package to fail:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/130/console

so I updated the install rules to install the include files as well in d8f823e5ebaa, which fixed the debbuild:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/40/

ign-launch build on-going:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_launch-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/131/console
